result.eng: The country has no natural resources.

result.eng: They left the country during the famine.

result.eng: He should be expelled from the country.

result.eng: Ireland was a poor country a long time ago.

result.eng: He united the country.

result.eng: He always remained loyal to his country.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.eng: For many reasons, this country is divided into two states.

result.eng: The reason for that is that it was out in the country.

result.eng: Five spies were based around the country under false names.

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: The second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ga: d'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.orig: d'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.html: d'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreachThe second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ponchtml: d'aṫraiġ an dara ionsaí an tír láiṫreaċThe second attack changed the country instantly.

result.eng: All airports in the country were closed.
result.ga: dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíre
result.orig: dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíre
result.html: dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.
result.ponchtml: dúnaḋ aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.

result.eng: People started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ga: tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar túr sears in siceágo
result.orig: tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar túr sears in siceágo
result.html: tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar túr sears in siceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ponchtml: tosaíoḋ ag aslonnú daoine as foirgniṁ ṁóra timpeall na tíre mar túr sears in siceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: d'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: d'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: d'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
